sentences.sentence: My dad has a rule that we have to carry our pumpkins back home, and as the eldest child I have an advantage—I carried an 85-pounder back last year.
sentences.translation: 我父亲有个规定，就是我们必须把南瓜搬回家，作为最大的孩子，我有一个优势——去年我搬回了一个85磅的南瓜。

sentences.sentence: A tax of $1.29 per pound adds 64.5 cents to a good half-pounder, plus whatever tax they stick on the cheese and bun.
sentences.translation: 每磅征收1.29美元税，意味着一个半磅的汉堡包会增加64.5美分的税，这还没有算上对汉堡包所含的芝士和面包征收的税费。

sentences.sentence: Yes, I'd like a quarter pounder, please.
sentences.translation: 是的，我要一个四分之一磅肉的汉堡。
